channel.title: [317] ::dropson command help [317]
channel.description: heyy person reading this, im having a little trouble with my server, im using paradiseX source, and theres not command for ::dropson, theres ::resetdrops, but when i try to use it, it says command no longer needed. and when i try to drop items, they dissapear, how do i fix this?
